content: beautiful and elegant bag in a lovely and timeless pattern it is crocheted in hobbii ribbon which is a soft ribbon yarn available in wonderful colors put your own stamp on the bag by choosing your favorite color and finding the perfect handle from our large selection of bag accessories enjoy **materials ** crochet hook size h/8 5 00 mm if you tend to crochet tightly it can be an advantage to use hook size j/10 6 00 mm instead hobbii ribbon leather handle magnetic button with flap 1 in 4 cm 12 rivets 9 x 13 mm **supplies** approx 550g ribbon **measurement ** approx 16 in wide and 11 5 in tall measured when the bag is laying down flat **abbreviations ** **chain** chain **st** stitch **slip_stitch** slip_stitch **single_crochet** single_crochet **blo** back loop only **double_crochet** double_crochet **fptc** front post triple crochet **k st** knit stitch 1 https //hobbii com/hobbii-ribbon-bag utm_medium=social&utm_source=ravelry&utm_campaign=pattern&utm_content=hobbii-ribbon-bag&utm_term=swr 2 ribbon
